person_say: Can it really generate meditation content automatically?
animal_say: Are you looking for a way to meditate, or would you prefer to learn how to create your own meditation sessions? Let’s find the perfect animal friend to guide you!

person_say: I would love to have an animal friend guide me on how to meditate!
animal_say: That’s wonderful! Meet Bruno, the bear mindfulness specialist. He can help you discover the art of meditation!
